name: Midas: A Touching Tale
description:
Everything you touch turns into gold, which doesn't sound bad... until you need a hug. Your goal in each level is to reach the exit while touching as few objects as possible.

CONTROLS

Use the arrow keys to control the character.

Use the R key to restart a level at any time.

Use the arrow keys, ENTER and ESC to navigate the menus.

ART BY: malgorzatakalinawierzbowska@gmail.com

The sound for some reason is a bit wonky on Chrome, so I'd recommend using Firefox or downloading the desktop version.

This game was made for Godot Fire Jam 1, hosted by BackAt50Ft.
